lines: 1. Engaki engiya mono,Bachenu bacha amo;K'Omotori' ar'eganga,'Kero bakomotera.
3. Ter'ogwancha kw'Omwana,bun' atigete igoro;Akaba buna tore,Agakwa atotorie.
4. Obwanchani bw'Omoika,kwororobia chinkoro;Kero tware nobwoba,Gatoa Omotoria.
5. Engaki engiya mono,'Bachenu baumerane;Yeso nabe eganga,Bamotere botambe.
